nav.beta: This website is still under development (beta).

header.description: Unleash your creativity with Intellipic. Upload images of any subject, train a neural network, and transform them into incredible artworks with various styles.

feature1.title: Upload Image üì∑
feature1.description: Smoothly upload your favorite images of any subject you desire.

feature2.title: Neural Network Training üß†
feature2.description: Utilize cutting-edge neural network technology to learn from the uploaded images and understand the subject's unique characteristics.

feature3.title: Style Selection üåà
feature3.description: Choose from a wide collection of styles to apply to your images, allowing you to create stunning visual combinations.

feature4.title: Image Generation ‚ö°Ô∏è
feature4.description: Watch in awe as IntelliPic generates new impressive images, merging the subject with the chosen style in real-time.

feature5.title: Infinite Creativity üîÅ
feature5.description: With IntelliPic, there are no limits to your imagination. Keep experimenting, training, and generating to discover captivating results.

feature6.title: AI-Powered Work Comes with Associated Costs. üí°
feature6.description: Due to substantial resources required for training, providing this service for free is not feasible.

privacy.title: Privacy and Security üîí
privacy.description: At IntelliPic, we prioritize your privacy and security. To ensure that your images are protected, we delete all uploaded images and generated artworks after 24 hours. This prevents any malicious use or unauthorized access to your data. You can use IntelliPic with confidence, knowing that your privacy is our top priority.

footer.license: This project is licensed under the MIT License.

Signup.noAccount: Don't have an account? Click here
Signup.alreadyAccount: Already have an account? Log in here
Signup.wrongEmailFormat: Wrong email format or email not allowed

Tos.title: Terms and Conditions of Intellipic
Tos.content: It is our policy to respect your privacy and comply with any applicable laws and regulations regarding any personal information we may collect about you, including all our website, https://intellipic.es/, and other sites we own and operate.
Tos.refundsContent: We can only refund training and image generation tokens that have not been used yet.
Tos.photoUploadContent: To upload photos to this site, you must ensure that they are either of you or you have the rights or permission to use them, and they are not nude or pornographic. We are not responsible for any harm that may result from uploading photos that do not meet these criteria.
Tos.informationCollectionContent: The information we collect includes both the information you consciously and actively provide to us when using or participating in any of our services and promotions, as well as information automatically sent by your devices when accessing our products and services.
Tos.legitimateReasonsTitle: Legitimate Reasons for Processing Your Personal Information
Tos.legitimateReasonsContent: We only collect and use your personal information when we have a legitimate reason to do so. In such cases, we only collect personal information that is reasonably necessary to provide you with our services.
Tos.collectionAndUseContent: By accessing and using Intellipic, you are also using the Replicate service, and therefore, you agree to the terms of use described at https://replicate.com/privacy. Please review these terms carefully before using the service. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the service.
Tos.collectionActionsContent: We may collect personal information from you when you perform any of the following actions on our website:
Tos.collectionActions1: Using a mobile device or web browser to access our content
Tos.collectionActions2: Contacting us via email, social media, or similar technologies
Tos.collectionPurposesContent: We may collect, retain, use, and disclose information for the following purposes, and personal information will not be processed in a way that is incompatible with these purposes:
Tos.collectionPurposes: Allowing you to access and use our website, associated applications, and associated social media platforms
Tos.informationCombinationContent: Please note that we may combine information we collect about you with general information or research data we receive from other trusted sources.
Tos.personalInformationSecurityContent: When we collect and process personal information, and while we retain it, we will protect it commercially acceptable to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification.
Tos.personalInformationSecurityNote: Although we will do our best to protect the personal information you provide to us, we recommend that no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure, and no one can guarantee absolute data security. We will comply with applicable laws in case of data breach.
Tos.personalInformationSecurityPassword: You are responsible for selecting a password and its overall strength, ensuring the security of your own information within the limits of our services.
Tos.personalInformationDurationTitle: Duration of Storage of Your Personal Information
Tos.personalInformationDurationContent: We keep your personal information only for as long as necessary. This time period may depend on what we are using your information for, in accordance with this privacy policy. If your personal information is no longer required, we will either delete it or anonymize it by removing all identifying details.
Tos.personalInformationDurationNote: However, if necessary, we may retain your personal information to comply with a legal, accounting, or reporting obligation, or for archiving purposes in the public interest, scientific research, or historical or statistical purposes.
Tos.childrenPrivacyContent: We do not directly target any of our products or services to children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information about children under the age of 13.
Tos.personalInformationDisclosureTitle: Disclosure of Personal Information to Third Parties
Tos.personalInformationDisclosureContent: We may disclose personal information to:
Tos.personalInformationDisclosure1: A parent company, subsidiary, or affiliate of our company
Tos.personalInformationDisclosure2: Third-party service providers for the purpose of enabling them to provide their services, such as IT service providers, data storage, hosting, and server providers, advertisers, or analytics platforms
Tos.internationalPersonalInformationContent: The personal information we collect is stored and/or processed where we or our partners, affiliates, and third-party providers maintain facilities. Please note that the places to which we store, process, or transfer your personal information may not have the same data protection laws as the country in which you originally provided the information. If we transfer your personal information to third parties in other countries: (i) we will perform those transfers in accordance with applicable law; and (ii) we will protect the transferred personal information in accordance with this privacy policy.
Tos.yourRightsTitle: Your Rights and Control of Your Personal Information
Tos.yourRightsContent: You always have the right to withhold your personal information, with the understanding that your experience on our website may be affected. We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your rights regarding your personal information. By providing us with personal information, you understand that we will collect, retain, use, and disclose it in accordance with this privacy policy. You have the right to request details about any personal information we have about you.
Tos.cookieUsageContent: We use cookies to collect information about you and your activity on our site. A cookie is a small piece of data that our website stores on your computer and accesses each time you visit, so we can understand how you use our site. This helps us serve you content based on the preferences you have specified.
Tos.policyLimitsContent: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please note that we have no control over the content and policies of those sites, and we cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy practices.
Tos.policyChangesContent: At our discretion, we may change our privacy policy to reflect updates in our business processes, current acceptable practices, or legislative or regulatory changes. If we decide to change this privacy policy, we will post the changes here at the same link by which you are accessing this privacy policy. If required by law, we will obtain your permission or provide you with the opportunity to opt in or out, as applicable, to any new use of your personal information.
Tos.contactUsContent: For any questions or concerns related to your privacy, you can contact us using the following details:

question1.question: What type of photos should I upload to the platform? üì∏
question1.answer: We recommend uploading a variety of photos to ensure that your avatar is as accurate as possible. This can include close-up shots of your face, profile photos, and full-body photos. It's important to ensure that your photos are clear and high-quality, and do not include other people or animals. We also recommend including a variety of expressions, locations, backgrounds, and perspectives in your photos to create the most accurate avatar possible.

question2.question: How similar will the avatar be to my appearance? üë©‚Äçüé®
question2.answer: The accuracy of your avatar will depend largely on the quantity and variety of photos you provide. The better and more diverse the photos, the easier it will be for the AI to understand and replicate your facial and body features. As a result, your avatar is more likely to resemble your real appearance!

question3.question: Is it possible to get a refund? üí∞
question3.answer: It is possible to get a refund for purchases made within the first 14 days, as long as you have not trained the AI yet. However, once the 14-day period has passed or if you have already used the service (by clicking the training button), you will no longer be eligible for a refund.

question4.question: What will happen to my photos? üñº
question4.answer:
You can delete all photos and associated datasets by removing the model from your account.

To request the deletion of your account and all associated data, please send an email to intellipic1@gmail.com. Please note that by deleting your account, you will no longer have access to any data or content associated with it.

Dashboard.title: Models ü§ñ
Dashboard.noModelsMessage: You haven't trained any models yet
Dashboard.buyTokensMessage: Buy tokens in the store to train your first model

ModelPage.tokenInfo: Write your prompt using the model token or @me, or use any of the available default prompts. Make sure the prompt is in English for the best results.
ModelPage.advancedMethodWarning: This method is designed for experienced users. Try the default styles if you're not getting the expected results
ModelPage.generatedPromptInfo: Generated a prompt from a template
ModelPage.defaultPromptInfo: Choose from one of the premade styles
ModelPage.modelNotReady: The model is not ready yet

ShopPage.extraInfo: Infinite possibilities for creating custom styles
ShopPage.noTrainedModels: You need to have trained at least one model before buying tokens for generating images

TrainPage.step1Description: First, make sure you have between 6 and 10 high-quality images to train your model. For the best results, your images should be close-ups preferably, showing only the subject, and the subject should be fully visible. For examples of valid and invalid images, go to
TrainPage.step2Description: Now is the time to give your model a unique and special name. This name will help identify the subject you are working with. For example, if your subject is Maria, you could use a name like TOKMAR. Remember, the more unique and different the name, the better the model will recognize your subject! Also, please select the type of subject you are using: is it a person, a car, an animal, a plant, or something else? This will ensure the model generates coherent images.
TrainPage.step3Label: Step 3: Wait for Your Model to Train
TrainPage.step3Description: This process may take around 15 to 20 minutes, so take a break and do something you enjoy. During this time, our powerful system is learning from your images and preparing to generate custom images based on your instructions.
TrainPage.step3CompletionText: Once training is complete, you'll be ready to dive into the exciting world of creating custom images! We're thrilled to be part of your creative journey and can't wait to see the amazing images you'll create. Enjoy the anticipation and get ready to bring your ideas to life!
TrainPage.trainingFailed: The model has failed, please try again
TrainPage.trainingCanceled: You have canceled training, please try again
TrainPage.step4Label: Step 4: Generate Magical Images from Prompts
TrainPage.step4Description: Congratulations! Your model is trained and ready to unleash its creativity. Now is the time to generate custom images that will leave you amazed.
